pageProduct.name: Restoria Discreet Colour Restoring Cream 250mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Gets rid of grey hair the same way you got it, gradually. Restoria Discreet works slowly over time to return natural looking colour to your hair. It gradually darkens grey or white to a light brown, dark brown or black if desired, allowing you control to the colour. Regular use of Restoria Discreet prevents grey roots reappearing. Works for all hair colours and gives natural results. Suitable for men and women

Size: 250mL

KEY FEATURES

• Gradually darkens grey or white hair.
• You can control the depth of colour.
• Use regularly to prevent grey roots from reappearing.
• Suitable for men and women.

Warnings

Do not use on broken skin. Wash hands thoroughly after use.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sulfur, Ammonium Chloride, Lead Acetate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Cetearyl Sulfate, Fragrance (Parfum), Denatonium Benzoate.

Directions

Refer to the easy step-by-step directions leaflet inside pack.
